bookAuthors: Alex Hirsch, Rob Renzetti, Andy Gonsalves, Stephanie Ramirez
Plot: Journal 3 brims with every page ever seen on the Gravity Falls show plus all-new pages with monsters and secrets, notes from Dipper and Mabel, and the Author’s full story. A 288-page full-color jacketed hardcover version of Journal 3 —plus, the book jacket doubles as an exclusive poster.
